title: Free Drama Performance at Fresno State
description: All UHS students and parents are invited to a FREE Drama preview of the Fresno State play called 4000 Miles this Thursday evening, Sept. 29 at 7:30pm at the Dennis and Cheryl Woods Theatre at Fresno State. The central character of 4,000 MILES is a troubled, but free-spirited 21 year-old man who has biked across America and suddenly arrives at his 91 year-old grandmothers apartment in New York. These two unlikely roommates struggle for much needed connection, an important theme after these years of Covid isolation. Serious theme with lots of laughs! 14 years and older is recommended

title: Scout Island Trip
description: The freshmen will be going to Scout Island on September 30th for a full-day field trip. 8:00 AM - 3:00 PM. Contact Dr. Gettman for more info.

title: Active Minds 1st Meeting
description: Attention all students interested in Mental Health: Active Minds will be having its first meeting for those that signed up during Club Rush or are still looking to join the club on Monday, October 3rd at lunch in room 108. We will be introducing club leaders and discussing future events. Come join us!
